title: Find the cofactor of a matrix
contentHtml:
Write a program to find the cofactor of a matrix

The cofactor of an element aij of a square matrix A is the determinant of the minor of A obtained by deleting the ith row and jth column of A. The cofactor of a matrix A is the matrix of cofactors of A.

Input  :
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9

Output :
[[-3, 6, -3], [6, -12, 6], [-3, 6, -3]]

404: Not Found

404: Not Found

404: Not Found
markdown:
## Write a program to find the cofactor of a matrix

The cofactor of an element a<sub>ij</sub> of a square matrix A is the determinant of the minor of A obtained by deleting the ith row and jth column of A. The cofactor of a matrix A is the matrix of cofactors of A.

```
Input  :
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9

Output :
[[-3, 6, -3], [6, -12, 6], [-3, 6, -3]]
```
